ygData.subject: Hello....and, Item Locations?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, 1st time poster, long time lurker :) Even longer time Bard :))) It s really nice to be able to read a list where you never really have to worry about
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all,
1st time poster, long time lurker :) Even longer time Bard :)))
It's really nice to be able to read a list where you never really have to worry
about walking into a flame war. Unfortunately, i have no interesting stories
to share, unless one finds the mindless slaughter of North Karanan Beetles for
4 levels interesting....(which is a good spot to go from 13 to 17-18, if you
don't need loot)

I had a couple of item related questions for some of those here more
knowledgeable than me...but some of the questions may contain info that may be
viewed as spoiler....
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
:
Does anyone know the location of the Runed Lava Pendant or the Granite Bracer?
Both of these items are pretty good stuff for a battle bard. (both have good
AC and STR buff) I Believe that the RLP is dropped in Sol A (but i have no
idea which mob, anyone?) And i have heard Rathe Mts. on the Granite Bracer,
but nothing err....concrete...sorry...

Any info that anyone has beyond this (or even a confirmation) would be much
appreciated.

Kaleid (yet to be determined), 17th song, Master Chef, Prexus
Clanggedin Stoneskull, 20th Cleric (Retired, cannot stand medding), Prexus

P.S. -> Was very upset when i got to 17th and found out that Mithril Quill was
Primary Hand only. ruined my plan for dual wield : (
===
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
